generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The BeanMenu class represents a menu object with various attributes such as ID, day, and restaurant point ID.
 * This class provides methods to get and set the values of these attributes, as well as constructors to create new instances of BeanMenu.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of this class include:
 * - Retrieving and setting the ID of the menu
 * - Retrieving and setting the day of the menu
 * - Retrieving and setting the ID of the restaurant point associated with the menu
 * 
 * This class also includes constructors to initialize a new BeanMenu object with specified values for ID, day, and restaurant point ID.
 * 
 * Overall, the BeanMenu class encapsulates the data and behavior related to a menu object, allowing for easy manipulation and management of menu information.
 */
